blending_in.name: Blending In
blending_in.description:
You gain +1 increased concealment.
When wearing armor, your movement speed is 15% less affected.
You gain 45% more experience when you complete days and jobs.

walk-in_closet.name: Walk-in Closet
walk-in_closet.description:
Unlocks an armor bag equipment for you to use. The armor bag can be used to change your armor during a heist.
Increases your ammo pickup to 135% of the normal rate.

fast_and_furious.name: Fast and Furious
fast_and_furious.description:
You do 5% more damage. Does not apply to melee damage, throwables, grenade launchers or rocket launchers.
Increases your doctor bag interaction speed by 20%.

brute_strength-1.name: Brute Strength
brute_strength-1.description: You grant 8% damage reduction for players in your group. This bonus is doubled for you when you are under 50% health.
brute_strength-1.vr_description: After dashing the player will heal from 0 up to a maximum of 3 health depending on the amount of stamina consumed. Can only heal a maximum of 50 health every 5 seconds.

marathon_man.name: Marathon Man
marathon_man.description:
You and your crew's stamina is increased by 50%.
Increases your shout distance by 25%.
When you are within medium range of an enemy, you receive 6% less damage from enemies.	Note: Crew perks do not stack.
marathon_man.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 0 up to a maximum of 6.

wolf_pack.name: Wolf Pack
wolf_pack.description:
Your crew will gain 10% more health.
You will gain 20% more health.
Note: Crew perks do not stack.
wolf_pack.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 0 up to a maximum of 9.

testudo.name: Testudo
testudo.description:
You gain 10% more armor and your crew gains an additional 5% more armor.
Note: Crew perks do not stack.
testudo.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 0 up to a maximum of 12.

hostage_situation.name: Hostage Situation
hostage_situation.description:
You and your crew will gain 6% max health and 12% stamina for each hostage up to 4 times.
You and your crew will gain 8% damage reduction for having one or more hostages.
Note: Crew perks do not stack.
hostage_situation.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 0 up to a maximum of 15.

brute_strength-2.name: Brute Strength
brute_strength-2.vr_description: After dashing the player will heal from 0 up to a maximum of 3 health depending on the amount of stamina consumed. Can only heal a maximum of 50 health every 5 seconds.

meat_shield.name: Meath Shield
meat_shield.description:
You are 15% more likely to be targeted when you are close to your crew members.
You gain 10% more health.
meat_shield.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 0 up to a maximum of 6.

giant_strength.name: Giant Strength
giant_strength.description: You gain an additional 20% more health.
giant_strength.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 0 up to a maximum of 9.

disturbing_the_peace.name: Disturbing the Peace
disturbing_the_peace.description:
All firearms have a chance to spread panic among your enemies.
Panic will make enemies go into short bursts of uncontrollable fear.
disturbing_the_peace.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 0 up to a maximum of 12.

800-pound_gorilla.name: 800-pound Gorilla
800-pound_gorilla.description:
You gain an additional 40% more health.
You regenerate 3% of your life every 5 seconds.
800-pound_gorilla.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 0 up to a maximum of 15.

type_1_armor.name: Type I Armor
type_1_armor.vr_description: After dashing the player will regenerate from 2 up to a maximum of 6 armor depending on the amount of stamina consumed. Can only occur 3 times every 3 seconds.

type_2_armor.name: Type II Armor
type_2_armor.description: You gain an additional 10% more armor.
type_2_armor.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 4 up to a maximum of 10.

type_3_armor.name: Type III Armor
type_3_armor.description: You gain an additional 10% more armor.
type_3_armor.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 6 up to a maximum of 14.

reinforced_armor.name: Reinforced Armor
reinforced_armor.description:
Your armor recovery rate is increased by 10%.
When your armor gets depleted you will be immune to health damage for 2 seconds. This cannot occur more often than once every 15 seconds.
reinforced_armor.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 8 up to a maximum of 18.

liquid_armor.name: Liquid Armor
liquid_armor.description:
You gain an additional 5% more armor.
Reduces the armor recovery time for you and your crew by 10%.
Note: Crew perks do not stack.
liquid_armor.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 10 up to a maximum of 22.

subtle-1.name: Subtle
subtle-1.description: Your chance to dodge is increased by 15%.
subtle-1.vr_description: After dashing the player will gain 1% up to a maximum of 6% dodge for 3 seconds depending on the amount of stamina consumed.

elusive.name: Elusive
elusive.description: You are 15% less likely to be targeted when you are close to your crew members.
elusive.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 1% up to a maximum of 7%.

evasive.name: Evasive
evasive.description: Your chance to dodge is increased by an additional 15%.
evasive.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 1% up to a maximum of 8%.

shadow_warrior.name: Shadow Warrior
shadow_warrior.description: Your chance to dodge is increased by an additional 15%.
shadow_warrior.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 1% up to a maximum of 9%.

killer_instinct.name: Killer Instinct
killer_instinct.description:
All your weapons have a 25% chance to pierce enemy armor.
Increases weapon swapping speed by 80%
killer_instinct.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 1% up to a maximum of 10%.

basic_recovery.name: Basic Recovery
basic_recovery.description: Your armor recovery rate is increased by 5%.
basic_recovery.vr_description: After dashing the player will regenerate from 2 up to a maximum of 6 armor depending on the amount of stamina consumed. Can only occur 3 times every 3 seconds.

ambidexterity.name: Ambidexterity
ambidexterity.description:
Dual wielded weapons have a -16 stability penalty.
Your armor recovery rate is increased by an additional 10%.
Ammo capacity for your akimbo weapons are increased by 50%.
ambidexterity.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 4 up to a maximum of 10.

advanced_recovery.name: Advanced Recovery
advanced_recovery.description: Your armor recovery rate is increased by an additional 10%.
advanced_recovery.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 6 up to a maximum of 14.

expert_recovery.name: Expert Recovery
expert_recovery.description: Your armor recovery rate is increased by an additional 10%.
expert_recovery.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 8 up to a maximum of 18.

tooth_and_claw.name: Tooth and Claw
tooth_and_claw.description:
Your armor recovery rate is increased by an additional 10%.
Your armor will recover 1.5 seconds after being broken no matter what the situation.
tooth_and_claw.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 10 up to a maximum of 22.

subtle-2.name: Subtle
subtle-2.description: Your chance to dodge is increased by 15%.
subtle-2.vr_description: After dashing the player will regenerate from 2 up to a maximum of 6 armor depending on the amount of stamina consumed. Can only occur 3 times every 3 seconds

basic_composure.name: Basic Composure
basic_composure.description:
Your chance to dodge is increased by 5% for ballistic vests.
Your armor is increased by 20% for ballistic vests.
basic_composure.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 4 up to a maximum of 10.

advanced_composure.name: Advanced Composure
advanced_composure.description:
Your chance to dodge is increased by 10% for ballistic vests.
Your armor is increased by 20% for ballistic vests.
advanced_composure.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 6 up to a maximum of 14.

expert_composure.name: Expert Composure
expert_composure.description:
Your chance to dodge is increased by 10% for ballistic vests.
Your armor is increased by 25% for ballistic vests.
expert_composure.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 8 up to a maximum of 18.

master_recovery.name: Master Recovery
master_recovery.description: Your armor recovery rate is increased by 10%
master_recovery.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 10 up to a maximum of 22.

sneaky.name: Sneaky
sneaky.description: Your chance to dodge is increased by 20%.
sneaky.vr_description: After dashing the player will gain 1% up to a maximum of 6% dodge for 3 seconds depending on the amount of stamina consumed.

bag_of_tricks.name: Bag of Tricks
bag_of_tricks.description:
Standing still and crouching decreases your chances to be targeted by 10%.
You bag corpses 20% faster.
bag_of_tricks.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 1% up to a maximum of 7%.

luck_of_the_irish.name: Luck of the Irish
luck_of_the_irish.description:
Your chance to dodge is increased by an additional 5%.
Your chance to be targeted while standing still and crouching is decreased by an additional 5%.
You pick locks 20% faster.
luck_of_the_irish.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 1% up to a maximum of 8%

dutch_courage.name: Dutch Courage
dutch_courage.description:
Your chance to dodge is increased by an additional 5%.
Your chance to be targeted while standing still and crouching is decreased by an additional 5%.
You answer pagers 10% faster.
dutch_courage.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 1% up to a maximum of 9%

breath_of_fresh_air.name: Breath of Fresh Air
breath_of_fresh_air.description:
Standing still and crouching increases your armor recovery rate by 20%.
You gain 10% crouching movement speed.
breath_of_fresh_air.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 1% up to a maximum of 10%.

overdog.name: OVERDOG
overdog.description:
When you are surrounded by threee enemies or more, you receive 12% less damage from enemies.
Your second and each consecutive melee hit within 1 second of the last one will deal 10 times its normal damage.
overdog.vr_description: After dashing the player will regenerate from 2 up to a maximum of 6 armor depending on the amount of stamina consumed. Can only occur 3 times every 3 seconds.

basic_close_combat.name: Basic Close Combat
basic_close_combat.description: When you are within medium range of an enemy, you receive 8% less damage from enemies.
basic_close_combat.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 4 up to a maximum of 10.

advanced_close_combat.name: Advanced Close Combat
advanced_close_combat.description: When you are within medium range of an enemy, you receive an additional 8% less damage from enemies.
advanced_close_combat.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 6 up to a maximum of 14.

expert_close_combat.name: Expert Close Combat
expert_close_combat.description: When you are within medium range of an enemy, you receive an additional 8% less damage from enemies.
expert_close_combat.vr_description: The dash effect is new from 8 up to a maximum of 18.

life_drain.name: Life Drain
life_drain.description: Striking an enemy with your melee weapon regenerates 20% of your health. This cannot occur more than once every 10 seconds.
life_drain.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 10 up to a maximum of 22.

tension.name: Tension
tension.description:
Killing an enemy regenerates 30 armor.
This cannot occur more than once every 1 second.
You gain an additional 10% more armor.
tension.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 4 up to a maximum of 10.

clean_hit.name: Clean Hit
clean_hit.description:
Killing an enemy with a melee weapon regenerates 10% health.
This cannot occur more than once every 1 second.
When you are within medium range of an enemy you receive 8% less damage.
clean_hit.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 6 up to a maximum of 14.

overdose.name: Overdose
overdose.description:
Killing an enemy at medium range recovers 30 armor.
This cannot occur more than once every 1 second.
You gain an additional 10% more armor.
overdose.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 8 up to a maximum of 18.

showdown.name: Showdown
showdown.description:
Killing an enemy at medium range has a 75% chance to spread panic among your enemies.
Panic will make enemies go into short bursts of uncontrollable fear.
This cannot occur more than once every 1 second.
showdown.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 10 up to a maximum of 22.

medical_supplies.name: Medical Supplies
medical_supplies.description:
Ammo packs you pick up also yield medical supplies and heals you for 16 to 24 health.
Cannot occur more than once every 3 seconds.
If the Gambler's current health is lower than another player's, the heal effect on the Gambler is increased by 20%. Stacks up to three times.
medical_supplies.vr_description: After dashing the player will heal from 0 up to a maximum of 3 health depending on the amount of stamina consumed. Can only heal a maximum of 50 health every 5 seconds.

ammo_give_out.name: Ammo Give Out
ammo_give_out.description:
When you pick up ammo, you trigger an ammo pickup for 50% of normal pickup to the other players in your team.
Cannot occur more than once every 5 seconds.
You gain 20% more health.
ammo_give_out.vr_description: The dash effect is now from 0 up to a maximum of 6.
